page.title: 03CALLINGTON COUNTY LIBRARY
page.content: {The library}is part of the comprehensive school complex. It is the only{dual purpose library}in Cornwall, being used by the school and the general public at the same time. Its stock is fully integrated between school and general reading material, totalling nearly l5,OOO books. It is staffed by a librarian and 3 part_time assistants, is open to the public 3 days a week and in daily use by the school. Records and cassettes are available on request.{Special services are provided for playgroups, the house_bound and poorly sighted. Regular story readings are given for younger children during the holidays.The library is available for exhibitions and lectures.
